d:
I return!

This chapter finds Mina and her ravenous band of Futanari staying at the newly opened Yamino Inn, owned and operated by what used to be one of Japan's wealthiest families, having fallen on hard times with the loss of their patriarch.

By a twist of fate one the daughters just happens to be one of Mina's classmates and with a bit of old Mina charm agrees to Mina, Tamana and Azusa stay for the weekend to drum up some good old word of mouth publicity.

What she doesn't know is that Mina has her sight on turning the whole resort into her own personal tourist trap-travellers go in, futa who will spread the infection nationwide, maybe even internationally, will come out!

Fun Futa Fact #3- As the parasites mature inside of them Futanari will begin to display additional abilities, usually in their queen first, such as pheromone glands, wall crawling, optical camouflage, creating clothing from biomass, powerful vaginal tentacles that can act as either third arms or second penises and most importantly the ability to lay flesh eggs that allow them to terraform areas they infest allowing them to remotely capture women who wander too close and quickly access to the main hive via tunnelling through the biomass they create

Link to Previous Part- https://e-hentai.org/g/3551630/ba4d3125be/
